channel.title: Help - A command making someone else do something!
channel.description:
I need help adding a command or a void that makes someone else do something. It's also making like the player say something. I understand all that, i just don't understand how to add a personal ("P."); If i could understand that or someone could explain it to me, that could be great.
I need to add one.

item.title: Help - A command making someone else do something!

item.description:
@Abyssal_Pk wrote:

I need help adding a command or a void that makes someone else do something. It’s also making like the player say something. I understand all that, i just don’t understand how to add a personal (“P.”); If i could understand that or someone could explain it to me, that could be great.

I need to add one.

Read full topic
